title: Pa Pa Lyrics Pizza 2 Villa Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Pa Pa
Singer: Gaana Bala,
Lyricist: Ganeshkumar
MOvie: Pizza 2 - Villa
Music : Santhosh Narayanan
pam pam pam pam pam pam pa pa

no fear cuts deep
..
to break free form the feeling
weaken the knees
you wanna grow , am made a glow
ready to rock, here is the show

Kanavugal theerndhu ninaivugal uraya
kaatru veliyinil suttri thirigiren
netraya kanavigal saayam poga
nilamai kandu nethum poga

yeah!!!!!
pam pam pam pam pam pam pa pa

Vahvum karaithu, anubavam thozhaithu,
piravi payanum thaedi thirigiren.
kurudhi mazhayil sotta nanaindhu,
unarchi illaa uzhagam padaikiren.

pam pam pam pam pam pam pa pa ..
you wanna grow , am made a glow
ready to rock, here is the show
